item.title: 1st stack: Ruby On Rails
item.description: Tổng quan về 1st stack 1. Backbone : ruby on rails ( ror ) Ruby version : >= 2.5.1 Rails version : >= 5.2.0 2. 3. Relational Databases PostgreSQL MYSQL 4. NoSQL Redis Memcached 5.Caching Caching stragies : https://devcenter.heroku.com/articles/caching-strategies Caching with rails : http://guides.rubyonrails.org/caching_with_rails.html Cài đặt ruby Hướng dẫn cài đặt ruby trên ubuntu(16.04)
